thread.section_title: Hotel Dei Borgognoni - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location. Better Service
thread.title_full: Great location. Better Service - Review of Hotel Dei Borgognoni, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: David W
title: Great location. Better Service
text: It's in the middle of every place yet it's a quiet and classy hotel The staff was friendly and helpful. Need a place to eat? They made excellent recommendations. Need a taxi, it was 4 minutes away. Be driven to the Colosseum and walk home Need directions? They made it easy. Breakfast was a pleasure. Very nice rooms with true king sized beds. Explore Rome on foot by being in the middle of it. They exceeded high expectations
